short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure, memorable and meaningful links to boost your produtivity

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ToLinks.io offers a browser extension that enables users to create custom, short links called "to/links" with a single click. 

The tool improves team productivity by helping users quickly locate and share important information, eliminating the need for manual searching or sifting through bookmarks.

The ToLinks extension for Google Chrome allows users to create short links to the webpage they are currently on, using the "to/" command without needing to visit their ToLinks dashboard. This way, users can easily share information with their team members by typing memorable shortlinks directly into their browser's address bar.

The ToLinks extension comes with several key features, including the ability to directly enter or instantly create short links, omnibox search support for easy searching, and the option to convert text into clickable short links. ToLinks is GDPR compliant, ensuring the security and privacy of user data.

ToLinks aims to simplify resource hunting and knowledge gaps for busy teams, allowing them to quickly access the tools they need. 

For more information, refer to: https://tolinks.io.
